Is this the place to ask questions about: ok, I just put ubuntu onto my acer aspire one laptop and the wireless internet is ungodly slow, but wired runs fine
you might want to try scanning wireless networks in range, and see if yours is on a different channel to theirs.
other interference (such as wireless phones) can also affect it. If you think its ubuntu, or a driver issue, then keep asking. Somone must know.
